title: Ticket #350: Add more ckpt/restart regression tests
description:
LIGO as agreed to provide the following to our checkpoint test suite to help pound on DMTCP vanilla universe checkpointing:

  1. A compiled MATLAB job.
  2. A Root job.
  3. Python job - this should use some external modules and possibly multithreaded. Maybe use scipy.
remarks:
2010-Jan-31 16:39:37 by anderson:
LIGO has provided the matlab and python test codes. If there are any problems with those please let me know.

I am still working on getting a self contained Root test suite.
creator: tannenba
